text: Agar xosta ʙudem, ʙa saʙaʙi on ilm, ki ʙa u doda ʙudem, martaʙai ʙalandas meʙaxsidem, vale u dar zamin ʙimond va az pai havoi xes raft. Sifati u cun sifati on sag ast, ki agar ʙa u hamla kuni, zaʙon az dahon ʙerun orad va agar rahojas kuni, ʙoz ham zaʙon az dahon ʙerun orad. Misoli on, on, ki ojotro duruƣ sumoridand, niz cunin ast. Qissaro ʙiguj, sojad ʙa andesa furu ravand
